main event: One balloon, shaped the size of a medicine ball, appeared to be bobbing and floating south.
interesting points: The observation was made on July 6, 1955, at 1900 hours., The sighting lasted approximately one minute., The object was reported to be a balloon, likely from nearby launching sites., The direction of the object was south., The report was part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book.
witness description: Mrs. (name withheld), living in Aberdeen, Washington
